string.text: Automates the handling of part items you can't use or repair.

Move part items with conditions below the specified threshold to the player's trade bag and donate part items with 0% condition.\nMoving items to the trade bag depends on which items each trader accepts, normally only technicians accept part items.
Move part items with conditions below the specified threshold to the body the player is looting. Bodies of important NPCs are ignored.
Delete part items with conditions below the specified threshold as soon as they enter the player's inventory.
Only weapon part items with conditions below this percentage will be handled by this mod.
Only outfit part items with conditions below this percentage will be handled by this mod.
Parts marked as favorites will never be handled by the script, no matter the condition percentage they might have.
Parts marked as junk will always be handled by the script, no matter the condition percentage they might have.
Ignore outfit part items that are used in any crafting recipes.
Ignore regular and synthetic cloth sheets, and durable and mil-spec textiles.\nThis option is redundant with the one above.
Handle those ammo parts you sometimes find in boxes or crows.\nThe mod will sell or delete them, depending on which options you have enabled.
Show a PDA message with the name of deleted or donated part items.\nMessages for items tranfered to the trade bag aren't made since you can easily find them there.
